title: What's the difference between monaural and isochronic tones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Firstly, binaural beats, monaural beats and isochronic tones are each a form of(auditory) brainwave entrainment. ... Monaural Beats (above) are similar to binaural beats but get the desired result faster. However, some people prefer the sound of binaural beats over the sound of monaural beats
